short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send locked/active/idle status to a Home Assistant server to enable automation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TL;DR: Turn on the lights when you unlock your desktop/laptop.

"Are you there? Hass" is a Chrome extension that reports to Home Assistant when your desktop/laptop user session is active, locked or idle. While it works on any OS, it is particularly useful for ChromeOS.

Home Assistant can then be automated when you unlock/lock your desktop/laptop to turn on/off the lights, or in the extreme case automate your chair.
